Agreed, she is a beast!
December 24, 2021
Maxphyte
She’s 60 points at a lower rarity slot. Having 8 clicks of life alone makes her good for her points. She starts off as a precision hitter who expands your action pool and can remove action tokens… and if the opponent actually uses actions to focus on her, she gets knocked onto 3 damage for the second half of her dial while your actual main attacker can do something. Having even one SHIELD TA to use can be a game changer so I don’t know how that trait is useless especially when you can still have the sidekicks getting bonuses from other captains and allies. Is she gonna be meta? Nope, that is usually reserved for just a handful of figures in a set. But play her in any normal game or even weekly tournament and she will be doing a lot for 60 points.
December 23, 2021
Goop
Yes its true you can build a team around any single figure and make it good, sure give her 3 enhancement and a bunch of perplex and of course she's amazing. Thats not how you should review a figure though. This figure, by herself with her two damage and naked defense is about average for 60pts. The sidekick trait is mostly worthless also.
December 23, 2021
Disasstah

Might be time to look into a for the D.M.A Agents to make an appearance.

Goop
I'm not sure what sidekicks she's suppose to give a bonus to. Maybe a spy team with Skrulls? Even still the shield TA is hardly a threat on the table. She's got a nice 12 attack and if you can give her some enhancement like lots of SHIELD figs can she could be decent. By herself though she's just kinda average for her cost.
